blob.summary: Add index.json for O(1) metadata lookups
blob.context: Current surface_relevant() loads and parses ALL blobs to score them. At 1000 blobs, this takes ~100ms. Index file with metadata enables O(1) lookups and filtering before full blob load. Confidence: 0.85 (architecture analysis).

next.step: Design index.json schema (blob path, scope, status, summary, files)
Update surface_relevant to use index for filtering
